thread.section_title: Wine Cellar Innovations Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Wine Cellar Innovations | winecellarinnovations.com
thread.title: Larry Peter
thread.title_full: Wine Cellar Innovations reviewed by Larry Peter

author: Larry Peter
title: Larry Peter
text: From the design phase, through delivery, and self install, Wine Cellar Innovations was there 100%! Grateful for the answers and guidance they shared with me through the entire process of installing my temperature and light controlled 500 bottle cellar. I would highly recommend the design service as well as the company as a whole. Total Pleasure. Thank you Wine Cellar Innovations!
